    • Method Detail

      • atSpaceship

        public boolean atSpaceship()
        Checks if the robot has arrived at a spaceship
        Returns:
        true if an only if the current place is the spaceship

      • dropItemAtCurrentPlace

        public boolean dropItemAtCurrentPlace(Item it)
        Drop an item in the current place.
        Parameters:
        it - The name of the item to be dropped.
        Returns:
        true if drop the item was successful

      • findItemAtCurrentPlace

        public boolean findItemAtCurrentPlace(java.lang.String id)
        Checks if there is an item with a given id in this place
        Parameters:
        id - Identifier of the item we are looking for
        Returns:
        true if and only if an item with this id is in the current place

      • getCurrentHeading

        public Direction getCurrentHeading()
        Returns the robot heading
        Returns:
        The direction where the robot is facing to.

      • getCurrentPlace

        public Place getCurrentPlace()
        Returns the current place where the robot is (for testing purposes)
        Returns:
        The current place

      • getHeadingStreet

        public Street getHeadingStreet()
        Returns the street opposite the robot
        Returns:
        The street which the robot is facing, or null, if there is not any street in this direction

      • initNavigator

        public void initNavigator()
        Initializes current heading and initial place with default values.
        Also updates views corresponding.
        Views in NavigationObserver shape must have been set to this before.

      • move

        public void move()
          throws InstructionExecutionException
        The method tries to move the robot following the current direction.
        If the movement is not possible because there is no street, or there is a street which is closed, then it throws an exception.
        Otherwise the current place is updated according to the movement
        Throws:
        InstructionExecutionException - When the street is closed or there isn't one street in this direction

      • goInReverse

        public void goInReverse()
        The method go back the robot, i. e. in the opposite direction at the source place.
        Otherwise the current place is updated in the GUI as no visited
        We assume that if robot could move forward, it can go back without throw any exception.

      • pickItemFromCurrentPlace

        public Item pickItemFromCurrentPlace(java.lang.String id)
        Tries to pick an item characterized by a given identifier from the current place.
        Parameters:
        id - The identifier of the item
        Returns:
        The item of identifier id if it exists in the place. Otherwise the method returns null

      • rotate

        public void rotate(Rotation rotation)
        Updates the current direction of the robot according to the rotation
        Parameters:
        rotation - left or right

      • scanCurrentPlace

        public void scanCurrentPlace()
        Prints the information (description + inventory) of the current place

      • addNavigationObserver

        public void addNavigationObserver(NavigationObserver navigatorObserver)
        Register a NavigationObserver to the model
        Parameters:
        navigatorObserver -

      • notifyPlaceItemsHasChanged

        private void notifyPlaceItemsHasChanged()
        Notify to the navigation observers that the items of the current place has changed
        Typically this occurs when one item is picked or dropped

      • initHeading

        public void initHeading(Direction heading)
        Initializes the current heading according to the parameter
        Parameters:
        heading - New direction for the robot
